.modal-dim { 
    display: none; 
    position: fixed; 
    top: 0; 
    left: 0; 
    width: 100%; 
    height: 100%; 
    z-index: 1000; 
}
.modal-dim .dim-bg { 
    top: 0; 
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    width: 100%; 
    height: 100%; 
    margin: 0 auto; 
    background: #000; 
    opacity: .4; 
}
.modal-dim .modal-layer { 
    display: block; 
}
.modal-dim .modal-top { 
    position: sticky; 
    top: 0; 
    left: 0; 
    right: 0; 
    z-index: 10; 
}
.modal-dim .modal-tit { 
    font-size: 20px; 
    font-weight: 700; 
    color: #fff; 
}
.modal-close { 
    width: 28px; 
    height: 28px; 
    border: none; 
    background: url('../img/close.png') center center no-repeat; 
    background-size: contain; 
}

.board { 
    margin-bottom: 20px; 
    padding: 20px; 
    width: 100%;
    height: 500px;
    border: 1px solid #d6dae1; 
    box-sizing: border-box; 
    background: #fff; 
}

$(function () {

    $(".js-modal-open").click(function () {
        $(".js-modal").show();
    });
    $(".js-modal-close").click(function () {
        $(".js-modal").hide();
    });

})
